text:
I’ll be headed back to the city that I love next week to share some VERY exciting news! I can’t wait to share with you all my next big project! Details coming soon! #NYC #tbt

A post shared by Peter J Kraus (@peterkrauswi) on Jan 18, 2018 at 5:57am PST
authors: Antoni Porowski Lookalike Is Peter Kraus Not John Mayer
title: Queer Eye Fans Are Getting Antoni Porowski’s Doppelgänger All Wrong

meta_data.title: Antoni Porowski Lookalike Is Peter Kraus Not John Mayer
meta_data.description: Queer Eye fans are in a heated debate over whether John Mayer is Antoni Porowski's doppelgänger. We're here to settle the mess once and for all.
